cz.ive.process
Interface ProcessTemplate

All Superinterfaces:
OntologyToken
All Known Subinterfaces:
DelegatedProcessTemplate, RendezvousProcessTemplate
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommonDelegatedProcessTemplate, CommonProcessTemplate, DummyProcess, Exchange, FollowProcessTemplate, HuntingStep, NeverAtomicProcessTemplate, Panic, PermanentProcess, Say, Step, Wait
public interface ProcessTemplate
extends OntologyToken

Interface for a process template. ProcessTemplate manages all information about process for both Genius and Interpreter. ProcessTemplate is one for a particular process available in the system. Whenever Genius wants to run a process it has to get an instance of Process by chosing apropriate ProcessTemplate and calling instantiate with correctly filled Substitution as a parameter.

Author:
Ondra

getSources

Substitution getSources()
Retrieve sources necessary for running the process. All source entries are expected not to be assigned to any objects. Only process's asumtions are filled in (source ID, type, obligatory...)

Returns:
Substitution

Returns:

atomicCommit

ProcessResult atomicCommit(ProcessExecution execution)
Evaluates partial results of running process. The atomicLength should be called if the process is still running after an atomicCommit call. This method may be called at random time. No ProcessTemplate implementation should expect any relation whith value returned by atomicLength function. So the implementation is assumed to be foolproof as much as possible.

Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

atomicLength

long atomicLength(ProcessExecution execution)
Makes an estimate of the process remaining run time.

Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
process run time estimate

atomicStop

ProcessResult atomicStop(ProcessExecution execution)
Called to stop the running process. This may not be an instant. If the process is still running, than the atomicLength should be called to retrieve updated run time estimate.

Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

increaseLOD

ProcessResult increaseLOD(ProcessExecution execution)
LOD has been increased so that the process is no more atomic. It should commit itself as necessary.

Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

decreaseLOD

void decreaseLOD(ProcessExecution execution)
LOD has been decreased so that the process ceases to exist It should commit itself as necessary.

isDelegated

boolean isDelegated()
Indicates whether this process is delegated or not.

Returns:
True when the process is delegated; false in any other case.

isRendezvous

boolean isRendezvous()
Is this template for a rendezvous process? Interpreter acts as usual, but also waits if the source "who" became an actor of the same process with the current actor substituted to the "who" source of the second process. If this happens, the iterpreter calls method rendezvous(two processes that have successfully met) on the iface RendezvousProcesTemplate.

Returns:
true if this is template for the rendezvous process.

getId

java.lang.String getId()
